OrgName: Lightspeed, LLC and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiary, Global Market Insite (GMI)
activities: Lightspeed, LLC (and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiary Global Market Insite, Inc. (GMI)) manages several consumer panels in Europe which consist of individuals who have registered to participate in market research on an ongoing basis. In addition, Lightspeed, LLC designs and delivers employee, leader, and customer surveys. Lightspeed, LLC collections information such as name, email address, postal address, phone number and demographic information and transfers such information to the U.S. Lightspeed, LLC may also transfer employee and client personal information to the U.S., including home address, phone number, salary, other compensation history, incentive plans, biographical information and background checks, performance evaluations, demographic information and other records in the employee’s personnel file.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program), EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for HR data only
